name: Salmon Patties III
author: Laura Curtis
summary: Salmon patties that are quick and easy. Great with eggs for breakfast, or serve with a salad for a light summer dinner.
ingredients: ¼ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and lightly grease a small baking dish
Place salmon in the prepared baking dish, cover, and bake 20 minutes, or until easily flaked with a fork
Place potato in a small saucepan with enough water to cover, and bring to a boil
In a medium bowl, mix salmon, potato, shallot, egg, and bread crumbs
Season with Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper
Place the cornflake crumbs in a small bowl
Form the salmon mixture into 1 inch balls, and roll in the cornflakes to coat
Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat
Press the balls into patties, and fry 3 to 5 minutes per side, or until golden brown
